com.paascloud.provider.service

接口 OpcOssFeignApi

  • 所有已知实现类:
    OpcOssFeignApiHystrix

    @FeignClient(value="paascloud-provider-opc",
             configuration=com.paascloud.security.feign.OAuth2FeignAutoConfiguration.class,
             fallback=OpcOssFeignApiHystrix.class)
public interface OpcOssFeignApi
    The interface Opc oss feign api.
    作者:
    paascloud.net @gmail.com

      • uploadFile

        @PostMapping(value="/api/opc/oss/uploadFile")
com.paascloud.wrapper.Wrapper<OptUploadFileRespDto> uploadFile(@RequestBody
                                                                                                              OptUploadFileReqDto optUploadFileReqDto)
        上传文件.
        参数:
        optUploadFileReqDto - the opt upload file req dto

        the wrapper

        @PostMapping(value="/api/opc/oss/getFileUrl")
com.paascloud.wrapper.Wrapper<String> getFileUrl(@RequestBody
                                                                                                OptGetUrlRequest optGetUrlRequest)
        获取附件完整路径.
        参数:

        返回:
        the file url

com.paascloud.wrapper.Wrapper<List<ElementImgUrlDto>> listFileUrl(@RequestBody
